question:
Display three different images. Skip two lines between each image. Each image should have a title.
 The sources for the images are:
 /images/ex3_1.jpg
 /images/ex3_2.jpg
 /images/ex3_3.jpg.
 For the alt and title tags, use: Butterfly1, Butterfly2, Butterfly3.
hint: Hint: You can insert an image with the img tag.
